nanasa 2wani adhyapanika rupawahini nalikawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathagege pradhanathwayen thangalla ruhunu wijayaba widyalaye di eeye (6) aarambha kerini.di.ee. rajapakshamahathage gunasamaru uthsawayata samagamiwa me wadasatahana aarambha kara atha.ee ee shreni sandaha mewani nanasa adhyapanika rupawahini nalika 8k aarambha kirimata niyamitha bawath palamu nanasa adhyapanika nalikawa me wana wita sarthakawa kriyathmaka wana bawa adhyapana amathi bandula gunawardhana mahatha adhyapana amathyanshaye di pasugiya 4wani da pawathi sakachchawaka di sandahan kaleya.mehi di sisunta thaniyama wuwa da siya adhyayana katayuthu sidu kala haki bawa adhayapana amathiwaraya sandahan kaleya.mahinda chinthana idiri dakmata danuma kendriya adhyapana aramunu sakshath kara ganimin rata pura prathinirmanaya wana dwithiyika pasal 1000n idiwana mahindodaya thakshanika widyagara sahitha pasal sandaha durastha adhyapana awastha pulul karamin mema nanasa wyapruthiya kriyathmaka we.gramiya sisunta wishaya nirdeshaya padanam karagena ihala mattame igenum pahasukam laba ganimata hakiwima, dwithiyika adhyapanaye gunathmaka ha pramanathmaka mattama wadi diyunu kirima ha nawina thakshanaya pilibanda danuma gramiya sisun wetha labadima yanadi aramunu padanam karaganimin mema wyapruthiya kriyathmaka kerena bawa amathiwaraya wadi duratath kiya..
ehi apa kandayama yalidu ekathu wu athara apa athara sitiye lankawe prasiddhama mal shalawaka himikaruwakuge puthra rathnayayi.
